content: this **rooster potholder** is part of my farmhouse collection 1 of tapestry crochet potholders being made in tapestry crochet this potholder is compact and doesn t have any holes thus it is very functional the free pattern for this potholder can be found on the blog and it only includes written instructions the pdf pattern also includes the pattern chart **materials** 3 0-mm 11 uk crochet hook dk 3 light cotton yarn in two contrasting colors tapestry needle **gauge** 28 single_crochet for 26 row in 4 10 cm worked in tapestry crochet **size** approximately 6 7 17 cm by 7 3 18 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusadesigns com/tapestry-crochet-potholders-farmhouse-collection/
